title: A place of healing
author: VD
content_html: With a low Cuss-o-Meter rating of only 6.2 percent, isn’t it good to know that your tender ears are safe here? Unlike that vulgar den of verbal filth known as Dr. Helen’s blog. I like to think of myself as the Emily Post of the Internet.
content_text:
With a low Cuss-o-Meter rating of only 6.2 percent, isn’t it good to know that your tender ears are safe here?  Unlike that
vulgar den of verbal filth
known as Dr. Helen’s blog.  I like to think of myself as the Emily Post of the Internet.
